org.thepaffy.kugellabyrinth

Class PlayActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • org.thepaffy.kugellabyrinth.PlayActivity

  • public class PlayActivity
extends Activity
    An example full-screen activity that shows and hides the system UI (i.e. status bar and navigation/system bar) with user interaction.
    See Also:
    SystemUiHider

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean AUTO_HIDE
      Whether or not the system UI should be auto-hidden after AUTO_HIDE_DELAY_MILLIS milliseconds.
      private static int AUTO_HIDE_DELAY_MILLIS
      If AUTO_HIDE is set, the number of milliseconds to wait after user interaction before hiding the system UI.
      private static int HIDER_FLAGS
      The flags to pass to SystemUiHider.getInstance(Activity, View, int).
      private BoardView mBoardView 
      (package private) Handler mHideHandler 
      (package private) java.lang.Runnable mHideRunnable 
      private SystemUiHider mSystemUiHider
      The instance of the SystemUiHider for this activity.
